story.title: Personality
story.content: A stubborn bull, horns like a devil, eyes like an angel, and a mouth like both.

story.title: Face to Face
story.content: A Taurus won't talk behind your back. They will do it right in front of you, to your face.

story.title: Secretive
story.content: They are incredibly secretive even if it seems like they are talking a lot and opening up to you.

story.title: Two Things
story.content: A Taurus speaks two things: Sarcasm and Realness.

story.title: Strength
story.content: Dependable, Persistent, Loyal, Patient, Generous, Reliable, Practical.

story.title: Weakness
story.content: Stubborn, Laziness, Possessive, Materialistic, Self-indulging.

story.title: Likes
story.content: Gardening, Cooking, Music, High quality clothes, working with hands.

story.title: Dislikes
story.content: Sudden changes, Complications, Insecurity of any kind, Synthetic fabrics.

story.title: Mission
story.content: To have worthwhile values upon which you can depend. To preserve these standards and build something that provides security.

story.title: Practical
story.content: Taurus makes practical use of the energy, which makes them passionate.

story.title: Security
story.content: Every Taurus wants to build something solid in life; something that will endure and provide lasting security.

story.title: Style
story.content: Every Taurus has a very personal and individual style and a particular method of evaluation.

story.title: Ticks you
story.content: Lots of hugs and affection strengthens the Taurus self-esteem, resulting in a loving and charismatic individual.

story.title: Importance
story.content: Family and home are very important to Taurus and they are always willing to lay hand for friendship.

story.title: Social
story.content: Taurus is very intelligent and has a good sense of humour, which makes them an excellent person to socialize.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Virgo, Capricorn.

story.title: Favourite Pastime
story.content: Eating, making love and sleeping are favourite Taurean pastimes, and not necessarily in order.

story.title: Affection
story.content: They show their affection through gifts and material things.

story.title: Patient
story.content: Be prepared to be patient with Taurus as a lover.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Scorpio, Pisces.

story.title: Recognise
story.content: Recognise that change is part of life.

story.title: Regularly
story.content: Compliment and praise others on a regular basis.

story.title: Judging
story.content: Don't be in a hurry to judge people.

story.title: Gift
story.content: Your special gift to the world is your capacity for love and loyalty.

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Leonardo da Vinci - Engineer

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Shirley MacLaine - Film actress

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Elizabeth II - Queen, United Kingdom

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Jack Nicholson - Actor
